Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Jackson/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Madison, Laramie, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Cicero, Madison, Laramie, and Jackson due to, street blockage near Jackson/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
